data.enText: dark brown powder made from the crushed seeds (called cocoa beans ) of a tropical tree
a hot drink made by mixing cocoa powder with milk and/or water and usually sugar

tr: powder of ground roasted cacao beans with most of the fat removed
a beverage made from cocoa powder and milk and sugar

value.def: Cocoa is a brown powder made from the seeds of a tropical tree. It is used in making chocolate.

example.ex: The Ivory Coast became the world's leading cocoa producer.
example.tran: 象牙海岸成为世界上可可粉的主要产地。

value.def: Cocoa is a hot drink made from cocoa powder and milk or water.

example.ex: My wife was tucked up in bed with her cup of cocoa.
example.tran: 我老婆端着一杯热可可窝在床上。

trans: 可可油，可可脂(用于制作巧克力和化妆品)
可可液块；可可膏；可可泥；可可块；可可料
可可蛋糕卷；可可饼；可可饼块；可可油饼；可可糕
